attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the discreditation of Parliment that Michael Martin has overseen, and the potential long term damage this could bring to our hard won, precious democracy, he has proven himself to be totally unworthy of gaining the traditional successive honour of a peerage to the speaker of the house, and play no further part in public life. "He must trouble us no more"

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
